mapper.select: select count(*) from board_reply where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into board_reply(rno, no, content, writer, pw) values(board_reply_seq.nextval, #{no}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{pw})
mapper.update: update board_reply set content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} where rno = #{rno} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.delete: delete from board_reply where rno = #{rno} and pw = #{pw}
